price: 276. Allah azali kobebisa ekotama mpe azali kopambola mbongo ya makabo. Mpe Allah alingaka bapengwi te basumuki.
arabic: يَمۡحَقُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرِّبَوٰاْ وَيُرۡبِي ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yamḥaqu al-lahu al-riba wayur'bī al-ṣadaqāti wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu kulla kaffārin athīmin
